database.querier

Class FuzzyFoodQuerier

  • java.lang.Object
    • database.querier.FoodQuerier
      • database.querier.FuzzyFoodQuerier

  • public class FuzzyFoodQuerier
extends FoodQuerier
    Food Querier which implement Levenshtein fuzzy serarch.

        levenshteinCosts - levenshtein algorithm parameters, {insert cost, delete cost, replace cost}
